resources.string: "Please note, your account will only be used as a way to save your progress and unsaved games. \n\n you do not need a password, and if you choose to make a brand new account, you can always do so."

"Hi! This is the help page for sudo solve, Zvi Badash's final project for the Android app design class of 2021. 

 This application is a tool for all avid Sudoku enjoyers out there, and beginner Sudoku players that need a guiding hand in Sudoku solving. 

 The main capabilities of the app are Guided Solving Mode (solving puzzles in a forgiving environment, with many helping hands)and Solution Mode, where you can view the answer for the given puzzle."

"The Sudoku puzzles can be given as input in two ways: Image input (highly recommended!) and Manual input. 

 For the image mode, just place the image in the frame of the prompted camera, and make sure to be steady when shooting! 

 Also, for optimal performance and accuracy, please try to film the Sudoku directly from above, with no side-to-side transformations. "

"Your sudo solve will be used for two main reasons: 

 (1) With your account, you'll never have to leave a Sudoku unfinished and restart all over again, 

 You can always log out and the current puzzle you are solving will be saved in the system! 

 (2) Another benefit of the account, is that you'll be able to keep track of you're statistics, and show them off to your friends ;) "
